inclusion.criterion: Provide a copy of their medical records from a primary care physician for the past year
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Be a healthy adult age 65 to 80 years old
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Be, in the investigator's opinion, compliant, able to follow the investigator's instructions and visit the clinic on schedule, cooperative and reliable
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: For participants living alone, provide the name and number of at least one friend or family member that study personnel may contact in the unlikely event that study personnel are unable to contact the patient by phone past 48 hours of a scheduled phone contact time which was not planned
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Score a 45 or better on the Berg Balance Test at screening (week -2)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Have a reading equivalency of 8th grade
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subjects must score within -1.0 standard deviations of the mean performance of healthy individuals on the neuropsychological tests at screen (week -2)
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Have a history of any type of epilepsy
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Be taking any concomitant medications that are or any concomitant medications that may alter cognitive function or mood
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Have a current or past history of drug or alcohol abuse or dependence. Have a positive urine toxicology test at screen
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Have a history and clinical finding of a progressive encephalopathy including CNS tumors of all types
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Have a serious illness in the past month that may confound the interpretation of study results
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Have experienced a prior adverse reaction or hypersensitivity to either study medication or to related compounds
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Be currently participating in another clinical study in which the subject will be exposed to an investigational or a non-investigational drug or device
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has history of severe intellectual disability, CHF, epilepsy. He has had seizures since age 13 and was recently tapered off Dilantin. He has a past medical history of depression.
